otherNames: Sakura Wars: The Gorgeous Blooming Cherry Blossoms, Sakura Wars OVA 2,   サクラ大戦 轟華絢爛 ; Sakura Wars 2: Return of the Spirit Warriors
synopsis: The end of the demon wars has ended and now the Flower Division has been able to rest up after their fighting. The second Sakura Wars developes studies on every Flower Division Combatee in every episode while they go on their miscellanious adventures around Japan.
